column5: Any one ever stayed at Minaki Lodge? Thanks

Jimbo, no one is responding because the lodge has been closed for several years. Multi-Million dollar complex including golf course. Not what I think of when going to Canada for a fishing vacation but for some maybe OK>. Opening this year under new mgmt....did alot of shows, we'll see if it flys this time?
Minaki lodge is open and under new ownership. According to Minaki they have fixed everything and are up and running. Beautifull place, with an amazing lodge and complex.
Thanks for the response. They had a couple young guys at our sprts show last weekend. Had a good pitch. Wonder how it will go for them? Seems like a nice place.Thanks
